Articles.Content:
![animation-111.gif](http://i1.wp.com/bitcast-a-sm.bitgravity.com/slashfilm/wp/wp-content/images/animation-111.gif)

Today I watched Tomorrowland, A Disney Movie Inspired By The "Tomorrowland" From The Magic Kingdom In Disney World? I still don't know.

The rocket launches, then doing a "Sonic Boom" pushing it out into orbit. Like The Orion Ol' Boom.

Need A Team To Make This Possible.

I think replicate the look of the rocket is possible with parts. Just need someone with expendable time and 3D modelling skill. That boom would require more work, though possible too:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/l2FPc6IAirg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

If it still works you could play around with this plugin for a sonic boom [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom)
